text:
JooVuu X | Android Developer | Manchester, UK | REMOTE | INTERN | www.JooVuu-X.com

JooVuu X is focussed on building advanced dash cameras for the fleet and insurance market. You'll really get to be able to test your knowledge and push yourself whilst helping to save lives and reduce costs for every day drivers. We're currently looking for an Android developer intern to help write our app.

We're a very small company in the latter stages of receiving funding and as such this position will be based on being the first hire once funding is received.

For more information please email: jobs@joovuu.com
